CustomField.description: If we are selling, enter price owned at as PAR (ie 100) minus any participation fees earned on Distribution Party Closed amount (distributed portion). Leave blank if we are buying. SGPRT-3852
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If we are selling, enter price owned at as PAR (ie 100) minus any participation fees earned on Distribution Party Closed amount (distributed portion). Leave blank if we are buying.
CustomField.label: Hold Price
